meanings.sent1: The balloon outbulged as more air was blown into it.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase outbulged with all the clothes packed inside.
meanings.sent3: The overstuffed pillow outbulged so much that it looked like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes outbulged in surprise when she saw the size of the cake.
meanings.sent5: The river outbulged after heavy rainfall, flooding the nearby fields.

meanings.sent1: The outbulged tire needed to be replaced before it burst.
meanings.sent2: The outbulged wall showed signs of structural damage.
meanings.sent3: The outbulged cheeks of the chipmunk made it look adorable.
meanings.sent4: The outbulged veins on his arms were a result of intense weightlifting.
meanings.sent5: The outbulged belly of the pregnant cat indicated she would soon give birth.
